addBucket.invalidS3Api: Invalid S3 API format, please refer to help
addBucket.step1: 1. Enter S3 API URL in format: https://[accountId].r2.cloudflarestorage.com/[bucketName]
addBucket.step2: 2. If you already have Bucket Name and Account ID, you can fill them directly
addBucket.step3: 3. Enter Access Key and Secret Key for authentication
addBucket.title: Add Bucket
